originContent: Please note that before your evaluation process, when Docker loads the databases, errors may occasionally occur due to environment inconsistency (these will not terminate the process but will appear in the Docker logs). As a result, some databases may fail to load properly, leading to empty databases. This will cause the evaluation results to be abnormally low.

SonuÃ§ olarak, bazÄ± veritabanlarÄ± dÃ¼zgÃ¼n yÃ¼klenemeyebilir ve boÅŸ veritabanlarÄ± oluÅŸabilir. Bu da deÄŸerlendirme sonuÃ§larÄ±nÄ±n anormal derecede dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼k olmasÄ±na sebep olur.

originContent: BIRD-INTERACT, an interactive text-to-SQL benchmark, **re-imagines Text-to-SQL evaluation via lens of dynamic interactions**.
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT, etkileÅŸimli bir text-to-SQL benchmarkâ€™Ä± olarak, **Text-to-SQL deÄŸerlendirmesini dinamik etkileÅŸimler bakÄ±ÅŸ aÃ§Ä±sÄ±yla yeniden kurgular**.

originContent: The environment blends a hierarchical knowledge base, database documentation and a function-driven user simulator to recreate authentic enterprise environments across full **CRUD** operations.
translatedContent: Ortam, hiyerarÅŸik bilgi tabanÄ±, veritabanÄ± dokÃ¼mantasyonu ve fonksiyon odaklÄ± kullanÄ±cÄ± simÃ¼latÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼ harmanlayarak, tam **CRUD** iÅŸlemlerini kapsayan gerÃ§ekÃ§i kurumsal ortamlar sunar.

originContent: It offers two rigorous test modes: (1) passive **Conversational Interaction** and (2) active **Agentic Interaction**, spanning 600 annotated tasks including Business Intelligence (BI), CRUD operations and etc., each guarded by executable test cases.
translatedContent: Ä°ki zorlu test modu sunar: (1) pasif **KonuÅŸma EtkileÅŸimi** ve (2) aktif **Ajanik EtkileÅŸim**, her biri Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±labilir test vakalarÄ± ile korunan, Ä°ÅŸ ZekasÄ± (BI), CRUD iÅŸlemleri ve benzeri 600 aÃ§Ä±klamalÄ± gÃ¶revi kapsar.

originContent: Typical evaluations trigger 1,968-5,496 interaction turns between model and user simulator, while state-of-the-art reasoning models currently solve only **â‰ˆ24%** and **â‰ˆ18%** of tasks, underscoring the benchmark's challenge.
translatedContent: Tipik deÄŸerlendirmeler, model ile kullanÄ±cÄ± simÃ¼latÃ¶rÃ¼ arasÄ±nda 1.968-5.496 etkileÅŸim turu tetiklerken, son teknoloji akÄ±l yÃ¼rÃ¼tme modelleri ÅŸu anda yalnÄ±zca **â‰ˆ%24** ve **â‰ˆ%18** oranÄ±nda gÃ¶rev Ã§Ã¶zebiliyor; bu da benchmarkâ€™Ä±n zorluÄŸunu gÃ¶steriyor.

translatedContent: style="width: 100%; min-width: 100px; display: block; margin: auto; ">

originContent: BIRD-INTERACT supports two evaluation modes as mentioned above:
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT, yukarÄ±da belirtilen iki deÄŸerlendirme modunu destekler:

originContent: - **c-Interact**: Conversational Interaction which is a passive mode and the workflow is fixed. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_conv`.
translatedContent: - **c-Interact**: KonuÅŸma EtkileÅŸimi; pasif bir moddur ve iÅŸ akÄ±ÅŸÄ± sabittir. Kod ve ayrÄ±ntÄ±lÄ± bilgi `bird_interact_conv` iÃ§inde bulunabilir.

originContent: - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`.
translatedContent: - **a-Interact**: Ajanik EtkileÅŸim; iÅŸ akÄ±ÅŸÄ±nÄ±n dinamik olduÄŸu ve model tarafÄ±ndan yÃ¶nlendirilen aktif bir moddur. Kod ve ayrÄ±ntÄ±lÄ± bilgi `bird_interact_agent` iÃ§inde bulunabilir.

originContent: We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation.
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT'Ä±n lite sÃ¼rÃ¼mÃ¼ olan `bird-interact-lite-exp`i yayÄ±mlÄ±yoruz; bu sÃ¼rÃ¼m Ã¶zellikle PostgreSQL iÃ§in 270 yÃ¼ksek kaliteli gerÃ§ek dÃ¼nya gÃ¶revi iÃ§erir. HÄ±zlÄ± denemeler iÃ§in iyi bir baÅŸlangÄ±Ã§ noktasÄ±dÄ±r.

originContent: The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon.
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT'Ä±n tam sÃ¼rÃ¼mÃ¼ olan `bird-interact-full`, PostgreSQL iÃ§in 600 gÃ¶revi iÃ§eren kapsamlÄ± bir benchmarktÄ±r. GeniÅŸ bir SQL iÅŸlemleri ve kullanÄ±cÄ± sorgularÄ± yelpazesini kapsar. Tam sÃ¼rÃ¼m yakÄ±nda Ã§Ä±kacak.

originContent: | Rank | Model Name         | Normalized Reward | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Level              |
translatedContent: | SÄ±ra | Model AdÄ±          | Normalize Ã–dÃ¼l     | Ort. Maliyet (USD)/GÃ¶rev | Seviye              |

originContent: > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details.
translatedContent: > \* BÃ¼tÃ§e Parametreleri: BaÅŸlangÄ±Ã§ BÃ¼tÃ§esi/KullanÄ±cÄ± SabÄ±r BÃ¼tÃ§esi, sanal para birimimiz *bird-coin* ile Ã¶lÃ§Ã¼lmÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r . Daha fazla bilgi iÃ§in [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) dosyasÄ±na bakabilirsiniz.

originContent: Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.
translatedContent: EtkileÅŸim-ZamanÄ± Ã–lÃ§eklendirme (ITS), bir modelin Ã§oklu dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸlÃ¼ etkileÅŸimlerle nihai performansÄ±nÄ± sÃ¼rekli olarak artÄ±rma yeteneÄŸini ifade eder. Bu etkileÅŸimli performans, modelin tam olarak belirtilmiÅŸ, belirsizliÄŸi olmayan tek dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸlÃ¼ ideal performansÄ±nÄ± aÅŸtÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda, modelin **ITS yasasÄ±nÄ±** saÄŸladÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± sÃ¶yleriz. KullanÄ±cÄ± sabrÄ± arttÄ±kÃ§a ve etkileÅŸim sayÄ±sÄ± biriktikÃ§e, performans sÃ¼rekli iyileÅŸir ve modelin uzun diyaloglarda etkili iletiÅŸimi sÃ¼rdÃ¼rebildiÄŸini gÃ¶sterir. Åu anda sadece claude-3-7-sonnet ITS yasasÄ±nÄ± saÄŸlamaktadÄ±r.

originContent: 1. Run Docker containers for bird-interact-lite database, bird-interact-full database, and evaluation environment:
translatedContent: 1. bird-interact-lite veritabanÄ±, bird-interact-full veritabanÄ± ve deÄŸerlendirme ortamÄ± iÃ§in Docker konteynerlarÄ±nÄ± Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±n:

originContent: > If you just want to evaluate on `bird-interact-lite`, you could comment out the [`postgresql_full` service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) in `docker-compose.yml` to speed up the environment setup.
translatedContent: > Sadece `bird-interact-lite` Ã¼zerinde deÄŸerlendirme yapmak istiyorsanÄ±z, ortam kurulumunu hÄ±zlandÄ±rmak iÃ§in [`postgresql_full` servisini](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) `docker-compose.yml` dosyasÄ±nda yorum satÄ±rÄ± yapabilirsiniz.

originContent: Wait for several minutes for database initialization.
translatedContent: VeritabanÄ± baÅŸlatÄ±lmasÄ± iÃ§in birkaÃ§ dakika bekleyin.

originContent: You could track the building progress by:
translatedContent: OluÅŸturma ilerlemesini aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki ÅŸekilde takip edebilirsiniz:

originContent: docker compose logs -f --tail=100 bird_interact_postgresql_full # or bird_interact_postgresql for bird-interact-lite
translatedContent: docker compose logs -f --tail=100 bird_interact_postgresql_full # or bird_interact_postgresql for bird-interact-lite

originContent: If finished, you should see the logs without errors like:
translatedContent: EÄŸer tamamlandÄ±ysa, hatasÄ±z olarak gÃ¼nlÃ¼kleri gÃ¶rmelisiniz:

originContent: bird_interact_postgresql_full  | 2025-10-28 17:58:30.413 HKT [1] LOG:  database system is ready to accept connection
translatedContent: bird_interact_postgresql_full  | 2025-10-28 17:58:30.413 HKT [1] LOG:  database system is ready to accept connection

originContent: If you have created containers before and want to recreate it, you could run the following command:
translatedContent: EÄŸer daha Ã¶nce konteynerler oluÅŸturduysanÄ±z ve yeniden oluÅŸturmak istiyorsanÄ±z, aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki komutu Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rabilirsiniz:

originContent: docker compose down -v # this cmd removes the containers and the volumes
translatedContent: docker compose down -v # this cmd removes the containers and the volumes

originContent: docker compose pull   # pull the latest images from Docker Hub
translatedContent: docker compose pull   # pull the latest images from Docker Hub

originContent: docker compose up -d --force-recreate # build and start the containers again. --force-recreate means force the recreation of the containers.
translatedContent: docker compose up -d --force-recreate # build and start the containers again. --force-recreate means force the recreation of the containers.

originContent: # Or `docker compose up -d --force-recreate bird_interact_eval` to only recreate the bird_interact_eval container about evalution code environment.
translatedContent: # Or `docker compose up -d --force-recreate bird_interact_eval` to only recreate the bird_interact_eval container about evalution code environment.

originContent: This runs 3 containers using prebuilt images from Docker Hub:
translatedContent: Bu, Docker Hub'dan Ã¶nceden oluÅŸturulmuÅŸ imajlarÄ± kullanarak 3 konteyner Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±r:
- `bird_interact_eval`: Hem `a-Interact` hem de `c-Interact` iÃ§in deÄŸerlendirme ortamÄ±.

originContent: Now, you could start the evaluation environment by executing the following command:
translatedContent: Åimdi, deÄŸerlendirme ortamÄ±nÄ± aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki komutu Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rarak baÅŸlatabilirsiniz:

originContent: 2. (Optional) Build the environment manually (if you want to build the images from scratch):
translatedContent: 2. (Ä°steÄŸe baÄŸlÄ±) OrtamÄ± manuel olarak oluÅŸturun (gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼leri sÄ±fÄ±rdan oluÅŸturmak isterseniz):
- [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view). SÄ±kÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rmayÄ± aÃ§Ä±n ve `env/postgre_table_dumps` olarak yeniden adlandÄ±rÄ±n.
- [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view). SÄ±kÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rmayÄ± aÃ§Ä±n ve `env/postgre_table_dumps_full` olarak yeniden adlandÄ±rÄ±n.

originContent: - Build the environment manually by running `docker-compose.build.yml`.
translatedContent: - `docker-compose.build.yml` dosyasÄ±nÄ± Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rarak ortamÄ± manuel olarak oluÅŸturun.

originContent: 3. (Recommended) Check the database containers are built and running successfully.
translatedContent: 3. (Ã–nerilen) VeritabanÄ± konteynerlerinin baÅŸarÄ±lÄ± bir ÅŸekilde oluÅŸturulup Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± kontrol edin.

originContent: -  Print the container build logs to ensure that the databases are built successfully without errors:
translatedContent: -  VeritabanlarÄ±nÄ±n hatasÄ±z bir ÅŸekilde baÅŸarÄ±yla oluÅŸturulduÄŸundan emin olmak iÃ§in konteyner oluÅŸturma gÃ¼nlÃ¼klerini yazdÄ±rÄ±n:

originContent: If errors occur, `"Errors occurred during import:"` will be printed in the log files.
translatedContent: Hatalar oluÅŸursa, `"Ä°Ã§e aktarma sÄ±rasÄ±nda hatalar oluÅŸtu:"` gÃ¼nlÃ¼k dosyalarÄ±nda yazdÄ±rÄ±lacaktÄ±r.

originContent: -  Check if the database containers are in good shape.
translatedContent: -  VeritabanÄ± konteynerlerinin dÃ¼zgÃ¼n durumda olup olmadÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ± kontrol edin.

originContent: Use our provided Python script to verify database metadata:
translatedContent: VeritabanÄ± metadatasÄ±nÄ± doÄŸrulamak iÃ§in saÄŸladÄ±ÄŸÄ±mÄ±z Python betiÄŸini kullanÄ±n:

originContent: - **Database:** The complete PostgreSQL database can be download from [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view) and [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view).
translatedContent: - **VeritabanÄ±:** Tam PostgreSQL veritabanÄ± [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view) ve [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view) adreslerinden indirilebilir.

originContent: - **data:** Each data instance contain the following main parts:
translatedContent: - **data:** Her veri Ã¶rneÄŸi aÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki ana bÃ¶lÃ¼mleri iÃ§erir:

originContent: - `amb_user_query`: The user query with injected ambiguities.
- `user_query_ambiguity`: The ambiguities injected into the user query.
- `non_critical_ambiguity`: The non-critical ambiguities like order, limit, etc.
translatedContent: - `non_critical_ambiguity`: SÄ±ralama, limit vb. kritik olmayan belirsizlikler.

originContent: - `knowledge_ambiguity`: The ambiguities created by masked external knowledges.
- `preprocess_sql`: SQL queries to run before executing the solution or prediction.
translatedContent: - `preprocess_sql`: Ã‡Ã¶zÃ¼m veya tahmin Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lmadan Ã¶nce Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lacak SQL sorgularÄ±.

originContent: - `clean_up_sql`: SQL queries to run after the test cases to revert any changes made to the database.
translatedContent: - `clean_up_sql`: Test vakalarÄ±ndan sonra veritabanÄ±nda yapÄ±lan deÄŸiÅŸiklikleri geri almak iÃ§in Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lacak SQL sorgularÄ±.

originContent: - `test_cases`: A set of test cases to validate the predicted corrected SQL.
translatedContent: - `test_cases`: Tahmin edilen dÃ¼zeltilmiÅŸ SQL'i doÄŸrulamak iÃ§in bir test vakasÄ± seti.

originContent: - `external_knowledge`: The external knowledge related to the specific task.
- **evaluation:** The evaluation code is available in the [`./evaluation`](./evaluation) directory.
To avoid data leakage by auto-crawling, we do not include GT solution sqls and test cases along with data.
translatedContent: Otomatik taramayla veri sÄ±zÄ±ntÄ±sÄ±nÄ± Ã¶nlemek iÃ§in GT Ã§Ã¶zÃ¼m sql'leri ve test vakalarÄ±nÄ± veriyle birlikte dahil etmiyoruz.

originContent: please email [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) with the tag `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` or `[bird-interact-full GT&Test Cases]` in the title for ground truth and test cases for the bird-interact-lite or bird-interact-full dataset, which will be sent automatically.

originContent: ### Combine the public data with the ground truth and test cases

originContent: Then use the following script to combine the public data with the ground truth and test cases:

originContent: Take the full version as an example:

originContent: We would like to express our sincere gratitude to **Irina Saparina**, **Mohammadreza Pourreza**, **Mehdi Bouzouina**, **Hailong Li**, **Jiatong Shi**, and Professor **Shinji Watanabe** for their fruitful discussions and valuable insights that helped improve this project.

originContent: - [2025-11-06] ğŸ› **Bug Fix** & ğŸ³ **Docker update**: Update the sqlglot version to 26.16.4 to fix the bug that the sql parser cannot parse the SQL correctly for user simulator. You could fix this by re-install it by `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` env. The `bird_interact_eval` image is also updated, so you could also pull it and recreate the `bird_interact_eval` container.

Bunu, `bird_interact_eval` ortamÄ±nda `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` komutuyla yeniden kurarak dÃ¼zeltebilirsiniz. AyrÄ±ca `bird_interact_eval` imajÄ± da gÃ¼ncellendi, bu yÃ¼zden bunu da Ã§ekip `bird_interact_eval` konteynerini yeniden oluÅŸturabilirsiniz.

originContent: - [2025-10-21] ğŸ³ **Docker update**: Add the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually! Please pull the latest images from Docker Hub and recreates the containers, e.g. using `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate`.

VeritabanÄ± dÃ¶kÃ¼mlerini indirip imajlarÄ± manuel olarak oluÅŸturmanÄ±za gerek yok! LÃ¼tfen Docker Hub'dan en son imajlarÄ± Ã§ekin ve konteynerleri tekrar oluÅŸturun, Ã¶rn. `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate` komutunu kullanarak.

originContent: - [2025-08-22]  ğŸ› **Bug Fix**: Fix the bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc.
